DOC.brief_summary: Sixty patient partially edentulous posterior maxilla require transcrestal sinus floor elevation technique insert one implant select . The purpose multi-center , prospective , double blind , randomize investigation analyze platform switch implant place limited maxillary residual bone height low bone density compare platform match implant without bone graft material .
DOC.brief_title: Implant-Abutment Interface Design Bone Soft Tissue Levels Around Implants Placed Using Different Transcrestal Sinus Floor Elevation
DOC.detailed_description: Approximately 60 subject require least one posterior maxilla implant area second pre-molars ( first second ) molars 6 9 mm crestal bone sinus floor , determine computerized axial tomographic ( CT ) scan , recruit study . Subjects receive dental implant replace miss tooth ( second pre-molar first/second molar ) one side maxillary arch . Each subject receive one type implant : platform switch ( PS ) platform matching ( PM ) . Each site receive either bone graft material compose anorganic bovine bone mineralize ( ABBM , Bio-Oss , Geistlich Pharma ) graft material ( collagen membrane use wound heal ( Collatape , Zimmer ) ) . At implant placement surgery post-surgical follow-up , treat site examine , clinically measure , radiographs photograph take . The central hypothesis mean crestal bone level platform switch ( test implant ) implant superior mean crestal bone level platform matching ( control implant ) implant place limited maxillary residual bone posterior region , regardless use bone graft material collagen membrane .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subjects must read , understood sign informed consent form . 2 . Subjects must 18 70 year age . 3 . Subjects must able willing follow study procedure instruction . 4 . Subject must maintain good oral hygiene . 5 . Subjects must single tooth miss premolar molar region maxilla ( ADA tooth position 24 1315 ; FDI tooth position 1517 2527 ) . 6 . The mesiodistal distance tooth gap bone level must least 6.8 mm allow placement Ø3.8 mm implant minimal distance 1.5 mm implant shoulder adjacent tooth bone level . A minimum 7.8 mm buccallingual ridge allow 2 mm buccal lingual plate require . 7 . No apical disorder/inflammation area implant site . 8 . Residual bone height range 6 9 mm . 9 . The implant must penetrate least 2 mm sinus mesial distal side . 10 . Sufficient bone width edentulous region ( ≥ 6mm ) . 11 . Subjects must commit study attend require followup visit . 1 . Subjects systemic disease would preclude dental implant surgery ( e.g . serious internal medical problem , disorder bone metabolism , uncontrolled bleeding disorder , weaken immune system , illness require periodic use steroid , uncontrollable endocrine disorder , uncontrolled diabetes ) . 2 . Subjects fail maintain good plaque control . 3 . Subjects contraindication oral surgical procedure ( e.g . inadequate wound heal capacity , poor oral hygiene , maxillary mandibular growth complete , xerostomia ) . 4 . Subjects mucosal disease ( e.g. , erosive lichen planus ) localize area around study implant site . 5 . Subjects present maxillary sinus pathology . 6 . Subjects history local irradiation therapy head/neck region . 7 . Subjects severe bruxing , parafunctional habit , temporomandibular joint dysfunction . 8 . Subjects receive , history receive intravenous subcutaneous antiresorptive agent associate osteonecrosis jaw , bisphosphonates . 9 . Oblique sinus floor ( > 45 inclination ) . 10 . Subjects untreated endodontic lesion untreated periodontal disease . 11 . Subjects heavy smoker ( define > 10 cigarette per day > 1 cigar per day ) chew tobacco , include within 3 month prior enrollment . 12 . Subjects physical mental handicap would interfere ability perform adequate oral hygiene . 13 . Subjects pregnant intend become pregnant duration study . 14 . Subjects require bone augmentation socket graft prior surgery . 15 . Subject allergic collagen porcine derive product . 16 . Subjects condition circumstance , opinion investigator , would prevent completion study participation interfere analysis study result , history non compliance unreliability .
